intro: Turn the knob to see change in volume

build.steps: Place the potentiometer and the buzzer on the breadboard

steps: 1. Connect a jumper wire from 5V to the third pin of the potentiometer
2. Connect a jumper wire from A3 to the middle pin of the potentiometer
3. Connect a jumper wire from GND to the negative rail of the breadboard
4. Connect a jumper wire from negative rail to the first pin of the potentiometer
1. Connect a jumper wire from D11 to the positive pin of the buzzer
2. Connect a jumper wire from negative rail to the negative pin of the buzzer
3. Run the Project and then go to the Play Section
